name: Avocado
properties: Does not produce oxidative or inflammatory activity
benefits: Despite being packed with calories and fat, avocado does not produce a rise in oxidative or inflammatory activity. The fat in whole plant foods like avocados comes pre-packaged with a rich matrix of phytochemicals and therefore does not demonstrate the same potential for oxidative damage as processed fats.
amount: Use in moderation as part of fruit servings

quotes: EFFECTS OF AVOCADOS ON INFLAMMATION - Researchers compared ice cream to the same calories of avocado. Unlike the ice cream, the avocado, despite being packed with calories and fat, did not produce a rise in oxidative or inflammatory activity.
The fat in whole plant foods, such as nuts and avocados, comes pre-packaged with 'a rich matrix of phytochemicals and therefore does not demonstrate the same potential for oxidative damage.'
